Entries.Biography:
Corwin is a sailor currently on shore leave, staying at the East Scarp Inn. He is a hidden character that must be unlocked through gameplay.

**Background:**

Corwin works as a sailor and is temporarily staying in East Scarp while on shore leave from his duties at sea.

**Living Situation:**

Corwin resides at the East Scarp Inn during his time in port.

Beatrice.Heading: Beatrice
Beatrice.Description: Corwin is friends with Beatrice, the lighthouse keeper.

CaptainRodrique.Heading: Captain Rodrique
CaptainRodrique.Description: Corwin is friends with Captain Rodrique.

Sailor.Heading: Sailor
Sailor.Description: Corwin is a sailor by trade, currently on shore leave.

Entries.BiographyEnd: Corwin is a sailor enjoying his time on shore leave in East Scarp, maintaining friendships with other sea-faring folk.
